structure.unit: Chapter 9 STANDARDS FOR CONSTRUCTION OF COUNTY BUILDINGS, ROADS, BRIDGES AND CAUSEWAYS

text.section:
Sec. 9-55. Fishing catwalks.
It shall be unlawful for any person to fish from any part of the structure, except from catwalks which shall be provided for that purpose. Such catwalks shall equal or exceed those specified and provided either by Miami-Dade County on the Rickenbacker Causeway or those provided by the State Department of Transportation on the Sebastian Inlet Bridge in Indian River County.
